author: Vadym Shynder
comment: Good app. It used to work fine with smartwatch, but not anymore. It can be open on the smartwatch but it never shows time information for a stop. Reinstall, clearing cache does not help

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Hi Vadym. Thank you for the review and for bringing this issue to my attention. You are correct - I can reproduce this behaviour on my smartwatch also. This is a new bug. I will aim to have this fixed in the new year. Thank you again - Aaron

author: Ruben Wegman
comment: The best LUAS Android app with regular updates and a proper material design look! Will always recommend this app (instead of the rubbish "official" app)

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Thanks Ruben - delighted to hear! I hope you enjoy the new Green Line (Cross City) stops included in the latest release. All the best - Aaron

author: Marcas Ó Duinn
comment: Tús maith leath na hoibre!   Is ansa liom é bheith in ann "ceanáin" a roghnú.  Tá Samsung agam leis an leagan gaeilge.  Dá mba mhaith leat na haistriúcháin a fheabhsú, bhí i dteagmháil liom!  Mar shampla, "Níl aon tramanna le teacht" agus "Gheobhaidh tú fógraí"

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Go raibh maith agat, Marcas! Tá brón orm, nach bhfuil mo Ghaeilge an-mhaith. I hope you don't mind if I continue as Béarla! Great to hear you find Luas at a Glance useful. Let me know what phrases don't translate correctly and I'll be happy to fix them. My email is in the Play Store app page. It's unfortunate more phones don't support Gaeilge.

comment: Extremely handy and reliable, still the best app for Luas.

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: (Updated 23rd Nov 2017) - Thanks again! Much appreciated! (Updated 3rd Oct 2016) - Hi. Great to hear you're enjoying Luas at a Glance. Apologies again for the Luas-side RTPI outage. Let me know if you run into any issues with the widget. I still consider it "BETA" due to some bugs I've seen in some launchers/home screens. All the best - Aaron

author: Tiberiu Prute
comment: Great app and simple to use.

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Hey Tiberiu. Thanks for your review! Glad to hear you're enjoying Luas at a Glance. If you have any suggestions or run into any issues, be sure to let me know. All the best - Aaron

author: Conor Marren
comment: Easy peasy

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Great to hear! Thanks Conor! - Aaron

author: Evelyn Kirwan
comment: Perfect app that makes it simple for the user. Just what I need, and it really is "at a glance". Thanks!

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Hey Evelyn. Thank you so much for the review - I really appreciate it! Delighted to hear you're finding Luas at a Glance easy and useful. If you have any suggestions, be sure to let me know! All the best - Aaron

author: Lee Rafferty
comment: Would you plan on adding more trams to the widget section. At the moment it only shows the 2 closest but would like to enlarge the widget to include more..... Adding the extra star for response time :) I just setup a tasker profile which adds what I need so don't worry about it. Enjoy the holidays!

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Hi Lee. Thanks for the review. Delighted to hear you use Luas at a Glance daily. Absolutely, I'm sure I can take some time to look at this over the next few days. Thanks for the suggestion! Let me know if you have any other suggestions. All the best - Aaron

title: Great app, use it daily

author: Tomasz Ostrowski
comment: This is a really good apk but you should add information about the start and end of the Luas works ... if I want to know at the moment whether I will be able to go Luas, for example after midnight ...

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Hi Tomasz. Thanks for the review and suggestion! I'll take a look at what's involved in gathering and presenting this information for the next release. All the best - Aaron

author: Brendan Joseph
comment: Even [much] better than the real thing.

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Thank you for the review, Brendan! Be sure to let me know if you have suggestions or run into any issues. I'll be happy to address them. Have a great Christmas - Aaron

comment: Travel times

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Hi there. Thank you so much for the review. I'm delighted to know Luas at a Glance is working well for you. Let me know if you have any suggestions. All the best - Aaron

title: Luas upto date

author: Kieran Durcan
comment: The only Luas app you need

author: Conor Murphy
comment: Nice app! Any chance you could add the ability to set a stop as the default? I see a few others have asked for this too. Thanks! Edit: perfect after replacing floating buttons with bottom navbar.

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content:
Hi Conor. Thank you so much for taking the time to review and leave great feedback. Absolutely, that is one of the next features coming.
[Reply shortened 19/04]

Edit 19/04: Fantastic! Thanks so much for updating your review. Delighted to hear you like the bottom navigation bar. If you have any other feature requests, please let me know!

title: Option to set default stop

author: Daniel D
comment: This apps great, easy to figure out and much nicer looking than the other apps on the store

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Thanks for the review, Daniel! I'm delighted to know Luas at a Glance has provided a good experience for you. If you have any suggestions or run into any problems, be sure to let me know. All the best - Aaron

title: Great Interface

author: Paul Gildea
comment: Maybe the best glance I've had all week. Sincerely, little boy.
title: Must buy

author: Calum Jones
comment: Ace.

author: Hugh Nolan
comment: I use this app every day to get to and from work. Some handy features that work very nicely! I love the notification feature particularly.
title: Great app

author: Vitor Nunes
comment: This app is very handy and integrates perfectly to my Android wear.
title: Great app!!!!!

author: Dave Matthews
comment: UI is great and the ability to select favourite stops is very useful. Edit 24/02: After getting a Zenwatch 2 I wish I could give this app more than 5 stars. The android wear support is top notch👌

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content:
Thanks for the review, Dave! Delighted to hear Luas at a Glance has been a good experience for you. Any suggestions you have, be sure to let me know!

Edit 24/02: Brilliant, that's fantastic to hear! Hope you enjoy your Zenwatch. I plan to focus a bit more on Wear features/functionality in the near future. Thanks so much for updating your review!

title: Much better than official luas app

comment: Very good. Gets the job done with little fuss.

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Thanks for your review, Conor! Delighted to know it's working well for you. I think you'll like the new feature coming soon. Stay tuned!

author: Chris Jolley
comment: Class

author: Lee Weller
comment: Thank you so much, all I wanted was a widget showing my local stop at glance and this delivers

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Great to hear, Lee! Many thanks for the review. Unfortunately, in its current state, the widget can tend to be a bit unreliable and often fails to update after a few days. I'm trying to track down the issue (it's probably a simple one) and will endeavour to get a fix out shortly.

author: Thomas Keane
comment: One minor suggestion would be the ability to set one of your favourites as the default stop instead of the point on the redline for example. But that's purely born out of my own laziness
title: Great app, simple and effective

author: Kork Soaker
comment: Was just surveyed on the Red line and bigged up the app to the survey lady, she seemed most interested!

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Thank you so much, Kork! What a wonderful thing to hear! I'd love to get some more context about this - i.e. what you told her about the app, what you like about it, etc. Always delighted to get any sort of positive feedback (or negative for that matter!). Thanks again - Aaron

title: Lightweight and Useful

author: Luke Benson
comment: Simple, clean and functional.
title: Does what it needs to

author: Krunoslav Uzelac
comment: Inaccurate times

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content: Hi Krunoslav. Thanks for the review. Apologies for the delay in responding - I wasn't notified about this. As the times come straight from Luas HQ, I believe your accuracy issues may have been related to the previous lack of "auto reload". This has been fixed in recent releases. Could you try it out now? I really hope this improves your experience.

author: Feidhlim Seoighe
comment: Great tool,  pitty about the lack of an Ghaeilge, although overall solid app all round!

reply.author: Aaron Hastings
reply.content:
Edit - Gaeilge support added! This is dependent on your phone having support for Gaeilge (locale ga_IE).

Thanks Feidhlim! Gaeilge will be coming very soon. It's next on my list :)

See below:
https://github.com/thecosmicfrog/LuasataGlance/issues/5

author: Eoin McHugh
comment: Simple reliable app that makes finding the information you need easy.
title: Simple reliable app

author: Daniel Flannery
comment: Nice clean Material Design Luas app. Faster, easier to use and better looking that the official app. Recommended!
title: Great Luas App

author: Charles Doyle
comment: Easily the best Luas app for Android wear. 10/10 would buy.
title: Fantastic

author: Ruaidhri Mulveen
comment: Very handy Luas app, great looking material design.
title: Great Luas app

author: June Hastings
comment: Luas at a glance,  brilliant when in Dublin on a visit.

author: Robert Gantley
comment: Well worth a download!!
title: Great app!

author: Shane Lynch
comment: Simples I Like

author: Saoirse Nic A'Bhaird
comment: Great app - Super handy

author: Matthew Fitzpatrick
comment: Great app!
title: Really useful
